name: Dark Strokes: Hidden Objects Finding Game
name_original: Dark Strokes: Hidden Objects Finding Game
description:
One of the best finding games in genres "Hidden object" and "I find" is here and ready to pay your attention!
If you love to find hidden objects, adventures in a new beautiful world, ready for quests and puzzles, it provides incredibly rich playing experience of this!

When true Evil comes for the people you love, what will you do?
That moment of reckoning has arrived for Ethan Black, a young man whose bride-to-be was snatched up in the blink of an eye by a terrifying menace known as the Faceless Ones.
Guide Ethan as he explores a decimated city, interacts with its remaining inhabitants, searches for clues that will lead him to his beloved Clair, and peels back the layers of a chilling supernatural mystery that began with the stroke of a paint brush and will end in a dramatic confrontation near a deep fiery abyss!

But be aware - this broken and abandoned city will not be so easy to explore and discover!
Welcome to the world of intrigue and mystery, powerful magic, dark sorcery, and witchcraft, where danger is everywhere and the light of hope is almost disappeared. Reveal all mysterious secrets, search and find all hidden objects and things, solve epic puzzles and mini-games and fight for your love!

Dark Strokes - hidden object mystery game features:

◇ Original storyline with unexpected ending
◇ 58 carefully hand-drawn unique locations and levels
◇ 16 funny mini-games and addictive puzzle games awaits you to engage
◇ 20 detailed hidden object scenes to search and find all carefully hidden objects
◇ Hint and step-by-step detailed walkthrough (guide), that helps you in hard moments
◇ Help you revise vocabulary and have hours of fun!
◇ Improve your concentration and focus, enhance your cognitive capacities!
◇ Magnificent graphics!
◇ Embracing sound and catchy melodies
◇ Numerous hidden objects - try to find and collect them all!
◇ Discover a hidden object story, which you can play on all kind of mobile phones or tablets
◇ Play without the Wi-Fi internet connection - this puzzle quest game will always be with you!
◇ Supported languages: Русский, English, French, Deutch, Spanish,
Danish, Hebrew, Greek, Hungarian, Italian, Dutch, Norwegian,
Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Slovak, Turkish, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Estonian

This fantasy epic story-driven hidden object quest game for girls and boys, kids, teenagers and adults, contains exciting various challenges, greatest detective storyline to investigate, cute characters and unusual artifacts and abilities. Please, welcome to enjoy this one of the best most beautiful, deepest, highest-quality, most epic hidden object searching game on your mobile device!

Play the best games from "Alawar", the creators of such games as Beholder, Farm Frenzy, The Treasures Of Montezuma, House of 1000 doors, on Google Play!
